alert.note: Alert for Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft; Wet Mountain Valley Below 8500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 02 at 2:14PM MST until December 03 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM MST SUNDAY THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 75 mph possible. * WHERE...Wet Mountain Valley Below 8500 Feet and Huerfano county region. The greatest threat for damaging winds in the Wet Mountain valley will be on the west side of the valley floor. * WHEN...From 2 AM MST Sunday through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft; Wet Mountain Valley Below 8500 Ft
